name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 中文繁简转换小工具 Chinese TC/SC Text Converter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 在繁體和簡體之間互相轉換 Convert text between Traditional and Simplified Chinese.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
該擴展功能十分簡單，方便繁簡來回轉換。
主要方便Windows用戶使用，MacOS有原生的轉換快捷鍵。

使用方法：
*（建議將圖標固定在擴展欄位上，方便隨時使用）
點擊圖標 - 直接將文字粘貼到框内，點擊“轉換為繁體”或”轉換爲簡體“即可。

理論上文本字數沒有限制。


The extension feature is very simple and facilitates easy conversion between Traditional and Simplified Chinese.
It is mainly designed for Windows users, as MacOS has native conversion shortcuts.

Usage Instructions:
(It is recommended to pin the icon to the extension bar for easy access.)
Click the icon - Simply paste the text into the box and click 'Convert to Traditional' or 'Convert to Simplified'.

In theory, there is no limit on the number of characters in the text.
